code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import'./AllDoctors.css';import Doctor from'../../components/doctor/Doctor';import{Context}from'../../context/Context';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AllDoctors=()=>{const{doctors}=useContext(Context);const[filtredDoctors,setFiltredDoctors]=useState(doctors);const handleSpeciality=speciality=>{if(!speciality){setFiltredDoctors(doctors);}else{const filtred=doctors.filter(doctor=>doctor.speciality===speciality);setFiltredDoctors(filtred);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"all-doctors py-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-4",children:"Browse through the doctors specialist."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"doctors-content d-flex gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('general physician'),children:"General physician"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('gynecologist'),children:"Gynecologist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('dermatologist'),children:"Dermatologist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('pedraticians'),children:"Pedraticians"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('neurologist'),children:"Neurologist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleSpeciality('gastroenterologist'),children:"Gastroenterologist"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"doctors-container",children:filtredDoctors.map((doctor,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doctor,{id:doctor._id,image:`http://localhost:4000/images/${doctor.image}`,name:doctor.name,speciality:doctor.speciality},doctor._id);})})]})]});};export default AllDoctors;
